mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dc_server_setting (HOST, SERVICE_NAME, POST, APPLICATION_SERVER, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, SUBJECT, SYSTEM_TYPE, CRONTAB, EXEC_TIME) VALUES (#{host}, #{serviceName}, #{post}, #{applicationServer}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{dbUsername}, #{dbPassword}, #{subject}, #{systemType}, #{crontab}, #{execTime});
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT p.id, q.HOST host, q.SERVICE_NAME serviceName, q.POST post, q.APPLICATION_SERVER applicationServer, q.USER_NAME userName, q.PASSWORD password, q.DB_USERNAME dbUsername, q.DB_PASSWORD dbPassword, p.SYS_VERSION sysVersion, q.SUBJECT subject, q.SYSTEM_TYPE systemType, q.CRONTAB crontab, q.CREATION_DATE createTime, q.EXEC_TIME execTime, q.CRONTAB cron, 'name', 'group', q.CLASS_PATH classPath FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.IP AND q.SYSTEM_TYPE = p.SYSTEM_TYPE WHERE q.IS_DELETE = 0 AND p.is_delete = 0 ) LEVEL1

SELECT p.id, q.HOST host, q.SERVICE_NAME serviceName, q.POST post, q.APPLICATION_SERVER applicationServer, q.USER_NAME userName, q.PASSWORD password, q.DB_USERNAME dbUsername, q.DB_PASSWORD dbPassword, p.SYS_VERSION sysVersion, q.SUBJECT subject, q.SYSTEM_TYPE systemType, q.CRONTAB crontab, q.CREATION_DATE createTime, q.EXEC_TIME execTime, q.CRONTAB cron, 'group', q.CLASS_PATH classPath FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.IP AND q.SYSTEM_TYPE = p.SYSTEM_TYPE WHERE q.IS_DELETE = 0 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, q.HOST host, q.SYSTEM_TYPE type, q.SERVICE_NAME serviceName, q.POST post, q.APPLICATION_SERVER applicationServer, q.USER_NAME userName, q.PASSWORD password, q.DB_USERNAME dbUsername, q.DB_PASSWORD dbPassword, p.SYS_VERSION sysVersion, q.SUBJECT subject, q.SYSTEM_TYPE systemType, q.CRONTAB crontab, q.CREATION_DATE createTime, q.EXEC_TIME execTime, 'group', q.CLASS_PATH classPath FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.IP AND q.SYSTEM_TYPE = p.SYSTEM_TYPE WHERE q.IS_DELETE = 0 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND q.CRONTAB = 1
AND host LIKE "%"#{host}"%"
mapper.update:
UPDATE DC_SERVER_SETTING SSH LEFT JOIN DC_DISTRIBUTE_SETTING DDS ON SSH. HOST = DDS.IP AND SSH.SYSTEM_TYPE = DDS.SYSTEM_TYPE SET SSH.HOST = #{host}, SSH.SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName}, SSH.POST = #{post}, SSH.APPLICATION_SERVER = #{applicationServer}, SSH.USER_NAME = #{userName}, SSH.DB_USERNAME = #{dbUsername},
SSH.SUBJECT = #{subject}, SSH.SYSTEM_TYPE = #{systemType}, SSH.CRONTAB = #{crontab}, SSH.PASSWORD = #{password}, SSH.DB_PASSWORD = #{dbPassword}, SSH.EXEC_TIME = #{execTime} WHERE DDS.ID = #{id}

UPDATE DC_SERVER_SETTING SSH SET SSH.IS_DELETE = '1' WHERE SSH.ID = #{id};
UPDATE DC_DISTRIBUTE_SETTING DDS SET DDS.IS_DELETE = '1' WHERE DDS.IP = (SELECT SSH.HOST FROM DC_SERVER_SETTING SSH WHERE SSH.ID = #{id});
